title: Obtaining dy
text: In order to determine dy, we must take the derivative of $$y$$.
speech: In order to determine dy, we must take the derivative of  y .

title: Solving for y'
speech: y is equal to fraction, 3 x squared, plus 2, over, the square root of x plus 1 end root   such that  y prime is equal to fraction, 9 x squared, plus 12 x minus 2, over, 2 times parentheses x plus 1,  raised to the 3 halves power  . Thus,  d y is equal to fraction, 9 x squared, plus 12 x minus 2, over, 2 times parentheses x plus 1,  raised to the 3 halves power  d x .

title: Plugging Into y'
text: Plug $$x$$ $$=$$ $$0$$ and dx $$=$$ $$0.1$$ into $$dy=\frac{9x^2+12x-2}{2{\left(x+1\right)}^{\frac{3}{2}}} dx$$ to solve for dy.
